definition: towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: The guide misled the tourists in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 向导在森林里给旅游者带错了路。

sentences.english: Our guide, who was a French Canadian, was an excellent cook.
sentences.chinese: 我们的向导是一个法裔加拿大人，他很擅长烹调。

sentences.english: Run the Database Wizard and re-link the shape to correct the problem.
sentences.chinese: 运行“数据库向导”并重新链接形状以更正此问题。

sentences.english: The driver is talkative and a good guide and had been working in Guangdong before.
sentences.chinese: 司机开朗，曾在广东打过工，一路是个好向导。

sentences.english: We tried to discourage him from climbing the mountain without a guide.
sentences.chinese: 我们曾设法劝他在无向导的情况下不要去爬山。

sentences.english: A guided local search (GLS) algorithm is designed to solve the model.
sentences.chinese: 设计了求解模型的向导局域搜索算法。

sentences.english: The wizard successfully unshared all of the shared folders.
sentences.chinese: 向导已成功停止对所有共享文件夹的共享。

sentences.english: Additional expenses come when enlisting the help of porters and guides.
sentences.chinese: 如果你雇佣搬运工和向导的话，还回增加额外的开支。

sentences.english: This reduces the set of workspace changes shown in the synchronization wizard.
sentences.chinese: 这可以减小同步向导中显示的工作空间更改量。

sentences.english: In ultrasonic nondestructive inspection of large-diameter pipes, longitudinal cracks can be detected more efficiently by using guided circumferential waves.
sentences.chinese: 周向导波适于大直径管道纵向缺陷的超声无损检测。

sentences.english: I’m your guide, I’m here to show you around .
sentences.chinese: 我是你的向导，我来这儿到你参观的。

sentences.english: This should open the Record a New Functional Test Script wizard.
sentences.chinese: 这将打开“记录一个新的功能测试脚本”向导。

sentences.english: If you want to travel there, I can be your guider.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想去旅游，我可以成为你的向导。

sentences.english: This step of Welcome Center wizard just configures the partitioning plan of your disks.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎中心向导的这一步仅配置磁盘的分区规划。

sentences.english: Let that be your guide for what you prioritize during your working hours.
sentences.chinese: 让那在你工作时成为你把什么放在首位的向导。

sentences.english: The default configuration wizard should complete within a few minutes.
sentences.chinese: 缺省配置向导应在数分钟内完成。

definition: to lead the way/to guide/to show the way/fig. to instruct
to lead a group/leader of a group/captain (of sports squad)
to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
to volunteer for/to offer to undertake
to camp/to pitch camp/stationed/quartered/Taiwan pr. [zha2 ying2]
